com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.ui.controller

Class AddRuleController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.ui.controller.AddRuleController

  • public class AddRuleController
extends java.lang.Object
    A session scoped, managed bean for user interfaces related to adding a new Rule instance
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Salman Ahmad Ansari <10besesansari@seecs.edu.pk>, Arjumand Fatima <09bicseafatima@seecs.edu.pk>

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.lang.String description
      A String variable to store the value of description attribute of the Rule instance to be created.
      java.lang.String name
      A String variable to store the value of ruleId attribute of the Rule instance to be created.
      com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.Target selectedTarget
      A Target variable to store the value of target attribute of the Rule instance to be created.
